title: Wallpapers
info: Wallpapers are a group of walls bought from the Painter. Despite the name, they work just like any other type of wall and do not have to be applied onto other walls. As such, they can be placed and used to prevent enemies from spawning, and can be used to fulfill the requirements of a house.
stat:
Type
Wall
Placeable
Use time14 (Very fast)
Rarity00*
Sell20
